name: The House on the Lake
description:
PLEASE FULL SCREEN

Uploaded as a WIP in time for the jam - audio transitions, credits and menus will be added soon! Completed in 2 weeks as part of RainbowJam19. Built with Unity and Pixelcrusher’s Dialogue System for Unity. Music Meydän and used under an Attribution License.

It’s early 1700s and Gareth DuLac just bought a house on the lake at Geneva, a long way away from  overbearing London society rules and his estranged family. Now he just has to deal with the ghost that doesn’t really want to leave said house peacefully to its new owners.
